summary: The module orchestrates forced alignment of speech audio against reference transcripts using NVIDIA NeMo ASR models (CTC and hybrid RNNT-CTC). It prepares data batches, runs streaming inference, applies Viterbi decoding to obtain word‑level timestamps, and writes alignment results into subtitle (ASS) and time‑mark (CTM) files as well as output manifests.
business_intent: Provide an automated pipeline for generating precise timing information for spoken content, enabling subtitle creation, transcription verification, and downstream speech analytics.
